message:
Dear {{ doc.applicant_name or "Candidate"}},

Your Candidate Portal has been updated. You can log in and review the latest changes.

Details:
- Candidate Name: {{ doc.applicant_name or"Candidate" }}
- Updated On: {{ frappe.utils.format_datetime(doc.modified) }}

Regards,
HR Team
name: Candidate Portal Update Notification To Candidate
subject: Candidate Portal Updated - {{ doc.applicant_name }}
